fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi all,
Your team, {{ content_object.group }}, is all the rage right now. {{ content_object.user.get_full_name }}
({{ content_object.user.email }}) just requested to join.

Click here to accept or deny the request

Thanks for steering your team towards a more efficient future!

Remember, {{ content_object.group }} is a closed team. Anyone who wants to join the
team has to get your nod first. To make it open, modify your team setting.

Kudos,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Team Join Request
fields.subject: Team Join Request

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},
You’re in! The team administrator just approved your access to {{ content_object.group }}.

Click here to go to {{ content_object.group }}

On the team page, you can see what your fellow members are doing and how you
stack up. That means now is the time to get your upgrade on! If you’ve already
checked off the featured action, browse the action library to find your next move.
The more actions you do, the more points you and your new group will earn.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Team Membership Approved
fields.subject: Team Membership Response

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},
A team administrator turned down your request to join {{ content_object.group }}. But
no worries! There are tons of teams on Repower at Home, including the one that’s
perfect for you.

Click here to find more teams
Click here to create your own

Remember, only closed teams need administrator approval. You can join any
of the open teams at anytime.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Team Membership Denied
fields.subject: Team Membership Response
